Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Really good food at a pretty reasonable price. We showed up 20 minutes before they closed (sorry!) and they still gave us great service. Make sure to ask for a fork and napkins if you plan on taking food to go!

Review Text: Ordered some Tacos and they tasted like near death, like something was not right about those. Delivery guy was nice though. But don‚Äôt get the Tacos.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: I've never given a restaurant one star before but the food was really that bad. The food was cold when it arrived, even though the carrier arrived within 20 minutes. ‚Ä¶

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: I ordered a veggie salad, probably the worst salad in the history of salads. 3(!) tortija chips at the bottom tasted like they have been trapped there forever, the black beans that should be there were missing (!) and the sauce roja and jalapenos were terribly spicy like I wanted to torture myself. Never again.

Review Text: My sister ate there I just accompanied. Next day she had food poisoning so strong they almost refused us to board, we had to get a fit to fly letter for her. She didn't eat much more on that day than in Taco Mundo so I would be carefull...

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: It took 7 minutes for two or them to figure out how to put one burrito and one drink on the system. Then another few minutes to navigate the card reader. And still managed to mess up the order. Walked out without the order.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Amazing - food is legit and super cheap. The churros are delicious and the staff are so friendly. Yaaas taco mundo u rock. also there is a vegetarian option for each menu item so extra yes thank u ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Delicious tacos! Absolutely perfect!! Thank you!

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: We didnt receive our order and tried to contact via phone and email and no response we are still waiting it's the next day and still havent heard anything back and still didnt get the food I expect a reply and a full refund very disappointed

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Got the order wrong, phone number not working and no response from the online customer service. Don‚Äôt waste your time with them.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: I asked for the extra bread and even though i wanted the pay for it amigo who works there said he doesnt know how much to charge and got so angry.Then he used f... word to my face.So moral of the story, you can eat there but get ready to be insulted.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Maybe not the most authentic Mexican in town, but tasty nonetheless. Very reasonably priced and I'm guessing it's a healthier option than let's say mc Donald's for a quick bite.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text:
Enjoyed the food.
Lovely flavors.
Especially quesadilla, guacamole, salsa was amazing.
Fries are to die for.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: They're definitely not the best tacos but when in Amsterdam you don't have a lot of room to be picky when it comes to tacos, unfortunately.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: The bowl was 8 euro.. It was chips with a dash of rice and meat... Save your money.. This place is a Mexican Subway.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Sloppy food. Degrading service. No relevance to Mexican food whatsoever. Waste of time and money. I hope I dont get a food poison.
